instructions_to_main_agent: Initialize a Vite + React + TypeScript project.
Configure Tailwind with the custom colors and fonts (Outfit, Be Vietnam Pro).
Create the 'StarryBackground' component first to set the mood.
Build the 'TodoApp' inside a 'GlassCard' centered on the screen.
Ensure the background image is loaded with 'object-cover' and low opacity (30-40%) to blend with the black background.
Use 'AnimatePresence' for the Todo List additions and removals.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (input, add-button, delete-button, checkbox).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container globally (body { text-align: center }).
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays are encouraged if possible.
